context.comment: [N]: Specifies the source of the Docker image that we want to deploy.
context.comment1: [?]:usr-signup]:security - [loginPageDomainPrefix: staging-hjolystratos] The prefix of the user pool web UI for users to log in. The complete URL is https://<loginPageDomainPrefix>.auth.<region>.amazoncognito.com
context.comment2: [N]:mq - The name of the ActiveMQ root user that should gain access to our ActiveMQ instance.
context.comment3: [N]: (Optional) If you plan to deploy the Canary stack, add the name of the user to log in. You first have to create this user manually via the sample application, e.g., canary.
context.comment4: [N]: (Optional) The email for receiving CloudWatch alerts.
context.comment5: [N]:part-I-addendum]:domain - The domain of your application, without protocol
context.comment6: [N]:part-I-addendum]:cert - The arn for the SSL certificate for your custom domain.
context.comment7: [N]:part-I-addendum]:a_record - The domain name for the hosted zone within Route53.
context.comment8: [N]: (Optional) If you plan to deploy the deployment sequencer, add the access token for GitHub to trigger GitHub Action workflow, e.g. s3cr3t.
